responsibilities: Developed and maintained production-grade web apps using Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Node.js, MySQL, Jquery.
Led frontend experiments through A/B testing and rapid iteration cycles to improve conversion and UX.
Optimized Core Web Vitals (LCP, CLS, FID) and implemented SEO/SSR strategies for improved performance and rankings.
Built full-stack features by integrating APIs with Node.js, Express.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams in Agile sprints using GitLab and GitHub.
Assisted in refactoring and maintaining internal web tools for operational workflows.
Gained hands-on experience with Git, JavaScript, and responsive frontend development.

currentProjects.title: Current Projects

projects.name: Tahaqaaq
projects.description: An AI-powered mobile app (IOS - Android) for Hadith authenticity verification. Features OCR, NLP for Arabic, speech-to-text, Firebase auth, and subscription monetization via RevenueCat.

projects.description: An AI-powered mobile app (IOS - Android) for Saudi Arabia News verification to help stop the fake news about the kingdom in social media. Features OCR, NLP for Arabic, speech-to-text, Firebase auth, and subscription monetization via RevenueCat.

projects.description: A modern web app leveraging Gemini Nano and Banana API for AI workflows. Built with scalable state management and query handling for real-time data.

currentProjects.summary: My projects showcase my journey from mastering modern frontend frameworks (React, Next.js, Vue, Nuxt, React Native, Expo) to delivering AI-integrated mobile and web applications powered by NLP, OCR, speech recognition, and APIs like Gemini Nano, Banana API, and OpenAI. I combine strong frontend engineering with backend and cloud expertise (Flask/FastAPI, Node.js, Firebase, Supabase, Google Cloud) to build secure, scalable, and high-performance solutions. With proven skills in Core Web Vitals optimization, CRO, SEO, state management (Zustand, TanStack Query, Vuex, Pinia), and testing, I focus on creating user-centric experiences and architectures that deliver measurable real-world impact.
